headline: Lam Research expects upbeat quarterly revenue on demand for chipmaking tools
summary: Lam Research forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as chipmakers ordered more of its equipment used to manufacture semiconductors for artificial intelligence applications. Shares of the Fremont, California-based company rose 2.2% in trading after the bell. The stock has doubled so far this year, supported by strong demand for AI semiconductors as chip designers seek equipment to create processors capable of meeting growing computing needs.

headline: Lam Research (LRCX) Q1 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: Lam Research (LRCX) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +4.13% and +1.99%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Lam Research shares jump as Q1 results, guidance top expectations
summary: Investing.com -- Lam Research Corp (NASDAQ:LRCX) shares jumped 3.3% in after-hours trading after the semiconductor equipment manufacturer reported first quarter fiscal 2026 results that exceeded analyst expectations and provided an upbeat outlook for the current quarter.

headline: Lam Research Beats Targets As AI Chip Production Drives Equipment Sales
summary: Semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research beat estimates for its fiscal first quarter and guided higher than views for the current period. LRCX stock rose.

raw.headline: Lam Research Beats Targets As AI Chip Production Drives Equipment Sales
raw.summary: Semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research beat estimates for its fiscal first quarter and guided higher than views for the current period. LRCX stock rose.

headline: Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) Beats Q3 Sales Targets, Inventory Levels Improve
summary: Semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) reported Q3 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 27.7% year on year to $5.32 billion. On top of that, next quarter’s revenue guidance ($5.2 billion at the midpoint) was surprisingly good and 8% above what analysts were expecting. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.26 per share was 3.3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Lam Research: Fiscal Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of 10 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.21 per share. The semiconductor equipment maker posted revenue of $5.32 billion in the period, also beating Street forecasts.

headline: Why Lam Research (LRCX) Shares Are Getting Obliterated Today
summary: Shares of semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) fell 5.3% in the afternoon session after investors grew concerned about a slowdown in the chip industry following a weak forecast from peer company Texas Instruments.

raw.headline: Why Lam Research (LRCX) Shares Are Getting Obliterated Today
raw.summary: Shares of semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) fell 5.3% in the afternoon session after investors grew concerned about a slowdown in the chip industry following a weak forecast from peer company Texas Instruments.

headline: Tesla Investors Pivot to Dreams of AI Future as EV Sales to Slow
summary: Chief among them is its stunning lack of earnings growth while its stock price continues to soar.  The Elon Musk-led electric vehicle-maker is expected to post a 25% drop in third-quarter profits from a year ago when it reports earnings Wednesday afternoon, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.  The decline is nothing new, as Tesla’s results have been in retreat for multiple years.
